thread.title: Detlef

author: Detlef
title: Detlef
text:
Even with a Little delay whilewaiting fo rthe shuttle to take us from the airpor tto the car, the Service was gret, without delay and without trying to sell any additional insurances. As I'm fluent in portugues, I hadn't any communication Problems, I don't know about the english skills of the People there.
GIving the car back ws even easier and faster and as well without any Problems.
